short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out just how fast you click with our simple and easy test from ClickingTests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you wondered what your click speed is? With our CPS test you can get your click speed, measured in clicks per second, in under a minute.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
1. Add the extension to your chrome account
2. Run it 
3. Choose your desired test length
4. Start clicking away
5. Review your results and try again to beat them!

If you are a gamer this is great for you to understand just how quickly you may be able to click. If you are trying to improve on your CPS this test can help you with that.
